title: Fix duplicate text, slow down road transitions, add comprehensive audio, restore road scenes after breakpoint and issue

requirements.summary: Remove duplicate sentences from StartJourneyScreen so each piece of information appears only once
acceptanceCriteria: No text content is repeated on the start journey screen
All essential information remains present and clear

file_operations.description: Review the component markup and remove any duplicate text content while preserving all essential journey information (break stop count, limited visibility warning, and start instructions)

requirements.summary: Change road image transition timing in AnimatedTravelFallback from current interval to 20 seconds per image
acceptanceCriteria: Each road scene image displays for exactly 20 seconds before transitioning
Smooth crossfade transitions remain between images

file_operations.description: Update the image transition interval to 20000ms (20 seconds) in the component's timer logic while maintaining the existing crossfade animation behavior

requirements.summary: Add audio/sound effects for all interactive elements and transitions throughout the journey experience where currently missing
acceptanceCriteria: Audio plays at appropriate moments during the journey flow
Sound effects enhance user interactions without being overwhelming
All major transitions and screens have accompanying audio

file_operations.description: Add sound effect playback when the start button is clicked to signal journey initiation
Add sound effect when user clicks to continue from road scenes
Add transition sound effect when loading screen appears between journey segments
Add celebration sound effect when RV badge award overlay appears
Add completion sound effect when final journey summary screen appears

requirements.summary: After break point arrival overlay is dismissed, show road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before proceeding to halt issue part
acceptanceCriteria: Road scene displays after break point overlay is closed
User can click anywhere on the road scene to advance
Flow correctly transitions from road scene to halt issue overlay

file_operations.description: Add a new flow state 'post-break-road-to-issue' between 'break-stop' and 'halt-issue' states to show road scene after break point dismissal
Add rendering logic for the new post-break-road-to-issue state showing TravelScene or AnimatedTravelFallback with ClickToContinueHint overlay, transitioning to halt-issue state on click

requirements.summary: After halt issue quiz overlay is resolved, show road traveling scene again with click-anywhere interaction before reaching final campfire destination
acceptanceCriteria: Road scene displays after issue overlay is dismissed
User can click anywhere on the road scene to continue
Flow correctly transitions from road scene to campfire destination screen

file_operations.description: Add a new flow state 'post-issue-road-to-destination' between 'halt-issue' and 'celebration' states to show road scene after issue resolution
Add rendering logic for the new post-issue-road-to-destination state showing TravelScene or AnimatedTravelFallback with ClickToContinueHint overlay, transitioning to celebration state on click
